events.title: Flash Coding Challenge
events.desc: Flash coding challenge is a competitive coding competition wherein students are required to solve a set of question within a limited time frame. Students are free to use any resource like Google, books, etc for solving the questions.

events.title: ProblemScape
events.desc: ProblemScape was an event wherein students were required to search the problems campus students are facing there, and to come up with an innovative solution. It have a prize pool of worth 30,000 rup.

events.title: Xyro, Battle Grounds
events.desc: Turing conducted an annual gaming event in Battle Grounds Mobile India. Competitions were also conducted for Chess, Valorant, etc

events.title: Xyro, Chess
events.desc: Turing conducted an annual gaming event for Chess. Competitions were also conducted for Battle Grounds, Valorant, etc

events.title: Arcania
events.desc: Arcania was a quiz competition conducted by Turing, which was to test, and enhance the General and Technical Knowledge of students.
